scenario.name: spit_register
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:ibk.tuwien.ac.at SIP/2.0 CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] User-Agent: SIPp From: MM_07-O <sip:MM_07-O@ibk.tuwien.ac.at>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] To: MM_07-O <sip:MM_07-O@ibk.tuwien.ac.at> Contact: <sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,OPTIONS,BYE,REFER,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,SUBSCRIBE,INFO Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0 Max-Forwards: 70

REGISTER sip:ibk.tuwien.ac.at SIP/2.0 CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] User-Agent: SIPp [authentication username=MM_07-O password=HRjg0ui6] From: "MM_07-O"<sip:MM_07-O@ibk.tuwien.ac.at>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] To: <sip:MM_07-O@ibk.tuwien.ac.at> Contact: <sip:MM_07-O@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,NOTIFY,REFER,MESSAGE Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0 Max-Forwards: 70
